title: VampCon
description: Jonathan Stoker begins to discover why he was turned into a vampire when all the vampires on the East Coast are summoned to Boston to the Vampire Congregation. The invitation is imbued with magical power, and cannot be denied. Turf wars between rival vampire clans are rapidly overtaken by the real reason for the VampCon: itâ€™s a bloodbath... and a sacrifice.
author: Armand Inezian
